report.title: Square Details Per Year 2
report.description: Report displays a list of NPMS squares and next to each square is a list of columns displaying information about the square e.g. number of samples recorded in 2015.
report.query:
SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false
LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavEx on lavEx.location_id=l.id AND lavEx.location_attribute_id=#excluded_square_attr_id# AND lavEx.deleted=false
LEFT JOIN locations plots on plots.parent_id=l.id AND plots.deleted=false
LEFT JOIN samples s15 on s15.location_id=plots.id AND s15.date_start >= '#2015_start_date#' AND s15.date_start < '#2016_start_date#' AND s15.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s15.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples s16 on s16.location_id=plots.id AND s16.date_start >= '#2016_start_date#' AND s16.date_start < '#2017_start_date#' AND s16.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s16.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples s17 on s17.location_id=plots.id AND s17.date_start >= '#2017_start_date#' AND s17.date_start < '#2018_start_date#' AND s17.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s17.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples s18 on s18.location_id=plots.id AND s18.date_start >= '#2018_start_date#' AND s18.date_start < '#2019_start_date#' AND s18.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s18.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples s19 on s19.location_id=plots.id AND s19.date_start >= '#2019_start_date#' AND s19.date_start < '#2020_start_date#' AND s19.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s19.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples s20 on s20.location_id=plots.id AND s20.date_start >= '#2020_start_date#' AND s20.date_start < '#2021_start_date#' AND s20.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s20.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples s21 on s21.location_id=plots.id AND s21.date_start >= '#2021_start_date#' AND s21.date_start < '#2022_start_date#' AND s21.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND s21.deleted=false
WHERE (l.location_type_id=#core_square_type_id#) AND #website_filter# AND l.deleted=false

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: excluded_square_attr_id
param.description: Id of attribute that holds whether a square is excluded or not. If it is excluded then don't display on the map.

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of survey ids to limit the results to.

column.name: excluded_square
column.sql: case when lavEx.id IS NOT NULL AND lavEX.int_value = 1 then 'Excluded' end
